source_objects.description: Learn how to lead and influence others with charisma, power, vision, intelligence, theories and more.
source_objects.title: Leadership

items.title: Leadership Series
items.headline: Complete Leadership Module
objectives_summary: What challenges—internal and external—are holding you back from taking the next step in your career? Women’s Leadership Series is created to help you answer these questions and to help you craft a personal narrative so you can take control of your career.

This course will help young students, professionals and aspiring female executives to acquire practical knowledge that will help them build and sustain their executive presence and avoid common pitfalls.

The course is designed to help the students learn, identify and improve their power presence through personalized coaching and intensive feedback. Women who want to influence and optimize their executive presence can acquire the necessary skills through this course
